replies.body: Just came here just to say how awful this list is already
Just came here to say you are entitled to your own opinion. So are they
TSM fanboy?
If anything 17th in the world is overrating them, lol
quarter finals at worlds means 8th place right? Even though i know there are better teams in korea who didnt appear at worlds. i think 17th is slightly underrated. should not be much higher though.
I think ??? is way better than ???... like srsly... ??? had such an amazing roster changes while ??? only sign a mid tier korean player...
I agree ??? really didn't hit it this year, though i think ???'s {{champion:103}} player did waaaay better than ???'s mid.

Nahh bro, u cant be serious. ??? rekt ??? straight up 1 on 1 during the summer season. ???'s teamates cant do shit either especially when they're playing against ???'s {{champion:107}} and {{champion:59}} . Best scenario, ??? get a spot for S5 worlds and get destroyed by everyone else at group stage.
I just don't get why !!! isn't on this list.

It's funny, but the team everyone is underestimating is ???, I think they had the best roster changes this season and can beat ???, ???, or ??? with ease.They should be near the top of this list not as far back as they are.

   Also I am surprised that ??? is placed so high, wasn't impressed with them at all last year, and I think they will get destroyed by better teams form their region like ??? or ???.
why have i even laughed so hard?
GO ??? ! I can't wait for the icon to come out!

Are you kidding me?????
??? is the best there!
If ??? doesn't get an icon this year, I'm going to be so ticked off. I'd buy ???'s icon in a second.

Reason why I didn't put all of the Korean/Chinese teams ahead of the western teams is because its lolesports and they're appealing to the english audience and the english audience doesn't like to hear that all/majority of the asian teams are that much better than the western teams.
Na OMG got uzi bro
and will finish second at worlds.  its the Uzi Curse.
and gogoing
You put elements in front of cloud 9? Did you watch iem San Jose?
And worlds, I mean seriously, hate me if you must but they are pretty overrated.
Elements is pretty overrated too.
I think he was talking about Elements lol
but it was only a best of 3, if it were to be a best of 5 the results could have changed. Thats the reason why I put Elements ahead of C9
do you not realize how good c9 are at bo5s? if they arent completely outclassed they are known for adapting extremely fast

He did not create that strength out of thin air... C9 is often praised for their ability to quickly adapt. Like that is one of the things people praise them for the most. Casters and other teams talk about it all the time, I don't know how you haven't heard this before. 

One recent example of their ability to adapt is their performance at worlds, just look at how they were able to find weaknesses in top korean teams. Granted it wasn't enough because there was a severe skill discrepancy in some lanes but they more than proved their adaptability in the way they turned what should have been one sided matches into having the winners barely holding on to their nexus. One flukey bo5 doesn't take away a trait they show consistently in their play. As you said, c9 doesn't usually need to resort to this skill as they have historically 3-0'd most of their competition in NA.
C9 all the way
Nice logo you got there :)
C9 HYPE!
TURN UP
C9 Whats That?
GO Gentlemen Poros! they should be at #1
UNICORNS OF LOVE
I saw one game of them against TSM they wooped us :P
but they are going to nerf range junglers next patch so it will be a nerf to uol

You underestimate them... they don't just do ranged junglers, they have 3 players that play all kinds of fun weird picks, and the mechanical skill and teamwork that merit respect without the off-meta fun stuff.

Changing to only 5 soft leashes before a hard leash is just nerfing that one odd stratergy of theirs, they have PLENTY more, and will contrinue to practice new ones as long as it's possible (which it always will be).
Yep top 3 NA teams this year C9 CLG and Curse
Sir, i think you accidentaly typed Curse instead of TSM, but it's fine we all make mistakes.
TSM is NOT going to be better than Curse this split.

Gonna be really hard for TSM to be worse than a team that doesn't exist. This is why you don't take the comment section seriously. People spouting crap when they know next to nothing about the game or teams. Not to mention everyone basing their opinions of TSM on a stupid preseason tourney that meant absolutely nothing other than fanservice.
You're arguing over that but not him putting CLG into the top 3...? Double is washed up in competitive play and Link is outclassed by most mids.
I've heard that Link has been stepping up his game over the break. He had to compete against a few other mid laners to keep his spot.

First they call CLG a bottom NA team when they lose to Gambit at IEM Cologne.
Now they consider CLG among the NA Top 3... Is it me or? Well.
